result.title: Tree problem
result.content: Hi all and happy new year! There is such a problem, which I can't solve. Please help me do that. We have two wighted trees(A and B). We want to join that trees, by connecting two vertexes from A and B tree(the weight of that path will be L), such that the diameter of final tree will be minimum. The sum of vertexes in both trees N <= 100000. L<=10000, weight of each path T[i] <= 10000. Problem is a subtask from IOI 2013(Dreaming, 1 day).
